subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[avoid]] [[mentioning]]
# to [[avoid]]; to [[regard]] as [[taboo]]
# [[taboo]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[name]] of a [[deceased]] [[emperor]] or [[elder]]
# {{†}} to [[fear]]; to [[dread]]
